name: reJoin Together
description:
This is our entry for the GMTK 2021 submission for the theme of "Joined together".

reJoin together takes players back to the nostalgic 90s local Singaporean era of being young and brings them back forward to the present to appreciate the comings and goings of the gift called life.

Our interpretation of Joined together is to be able to relive back our old Singaporean-local childhood, exploring blocks of flats and catching spiders in the 90s thus reJoining together back the memories spent outside.

Controls

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
Select - Shift

The game can also be downloaded and be played as a gameboy ROM.

Made with GBStudio and Aseprite

Done by me and @wanzieeeeees on instagram

AKA StealthDolphin
